docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: QGIS Tutorials and Tips
docs.text: We use tutorials and guidlines from here

docs.title: Google Earth
docs.text:
Explore worldwide satellite imagery and 3D buildings and terrain for hundreds of cities. Zoom to your house or anywhere else, then dive in for a 360°. Download it from here. Select "Google Earth Pro on desktop"

!!!warning If you are Linux or Mac OS system user check your marketplace or follow official instructions written on websites.

docs.title: QGIS
docs.text:
QGIS is a geographic information system (GIS) software that is free and open-source. Download it from here . Select "Long Term Version for Windows (3.40 LTR)"

!!!warning If you are Linux or Mac OS system user check your marketplace or follow official instructions written on websites.
